org.softlang.megal.plugins.api

Class GuidedReasonerPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.softlang.megal.mi2.api.AbstractPlugin
      • org.softlang.megal.mi2.api.AbstractReasonerPlugin
        • org.softlang.megal.plugins.api.InjectedReasonerPlugin
          • org.softlang.megal.plugins.api.GuidedReasonerPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Context, Emission, Plugin, ReasonerPlugin, Resolution
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FileExtensionLanguageReasoner, FileFragmentationReasoner, FolderReasoner, GuidedFragmentReasonerPlugin, LanguageResolver, PartOfReasoner, XMLDialectReasoner, XMLFileCorrespondsToJavaObject, XSDFragmentResolver, XSDJavaCorrespondence

    public abstract class GuidedReasonerPlugin
extends InjectedReasonerPlugin
    Abstract base class for guided reasoner plugins.
    Author:
    lukashaertel, maxmeffert

      • when

        protected void when(boolean condition)
        Checks a given condition.

        If the condition is not satisfied, a GuidedExitException will be thrown, which will end the plugin evaluation. As a rule of thumb: DO NOT put when-calls inside try-catch-blocks or make sure that GuidedExitException are not caught.

        Parameters:
        condition -
